comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:7.0a1) Gecko/20110531 Firefox/7.0a1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:7.0a1) Gecko/20110531 Firefox/7.0a1

The "remember password" doorhanger is followed by a "you can use your passwords on all devices with Sync" doorhanger which contains some blue nearly-invisible blob which I expect to be a link. Clicking it does nothing.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. load a page that requires entering password
2. log in to show the "remember password" and "sync" doorhanger
3. click blue smudge on "sync" doorhanger

Actual Results:  
nothing

Expected Results:  
a link loads
comments.author: hramrach@gmail.com
